column6: Embrace change. With these two words the Skrull Empire declares their intentions to the entire Marvel Universe. And if the heroes and citizens of Earth do not change, then they will most certainly perish in the flames of the Secret Invasion!
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | colorist:Gabriele Dell'Otto | colorist:Laura Martin | other:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Mark Morales | penciller:Leinil Francis Yu
